Name: Archer
Quote: \`A cage. To stay behind bars until all chance of valor\rhas gone beyond recall or desire.\`
citation: I never was truly my own master but was always ruled by circumstance. - napoleon

Name: Archer2
Quote: \'He was a good outlaw, and did poor men much good.\'

Name: Armada
Quote: I will make thee a terror, and thou shall be no more:\rthough sought for, thou shall never be found again.

Name: Armada2
Quote: \`And they called it a fleet... Ha!\rNothing more than a heap of ash and silver wasted(squandered?).\`

Name: Assassin
Quote: \`Et tu brute?\`

Name: Assault
Quote: Doomed to flames of woe;\nOur lady of sorrows.

Name: Assault2
Quote: A brave man dies but once,\rA coward daily.

Name: Assault3

Quote: The Kingdom of Heaven is spread out over the earth, and men cannot see it.

Name: Bowman
Quote: They said he could hit an apple off her head,\rbut she was rude and he was peckish.

Name: Bowman2
Quote: Tick Tick Tick, Clunk, Thwap, Bullseye!

Name: Burden
Quote: Seek strength, the rest will follow.

Name: Calvary
Quote attribution: The Polish King after the charge of the winged hussars at vienna
Quote: It is a victory of which past centuries had never heard, inestimable riches have fallen into our hands and countless of the enemy lie slain.
citation: Jan III Sobieski: Listy do królowej Marysieńki (ug.edu.pl)

Name: Calvary2
Quote attribution: bible, cannot find an actual verse for this
Quote: Seven trumpets will sound before the end of the age\rand we will be chosen!

Name: Calvary3
Quote: Fall in love dear maiden, while your lips are red,\rbefore you are cold, for there will be no tomorrow.
citation: unclear what the first translation of this into english is

Name: Cannon
Quote: Truth is ever to be found in simplicity, and not in\rthe multiplicity and confusion of things.
citation: hard to tell if he actually said this https://en.wikiquote.org/wiki/Isaac_Newton#:~:text=Katz%2C%20p.%20124-,Truth%20is%20ever%20to%20be%20found%20in%20simplicity%2C%20and%20not%20in%20the%20multiplicity%20and%20confusion%20of%20things,-.

Name: Cannon2
Quote: Dynamite will sooner lead to peace than a thousand\rworld conventions.

Name: Cannon3
Quote: \`All the guns of Orban could not match our\rfirepower!\`

Name: Cannon4
Quote: If they want peace, nations should avoid the\rpin-pricks that precede cannon shots.

Name: Catapult
Quote: Scipio wept for Carthage.\r"A day will come when sacred Troy shall perish,\r And Priam and his people shall be slain."

Name: ClearSkies
Quote: Doubt the stars are fire; Doubt the sun doth move;\rDoubt truth to be a liar; But never doubt I love.

Name: Crusade
Quote: Deus Vult!

Name: Crusader
Quote attribution: A canticle for lebowitz in copyright, should change to bible quote i guess
Quote: You'll be asked to be the ass He rides into Jerusalem.\rIt'll break your back, because He's carrying the sins\rof the world.

Name: Death
Quote: The dream fades, the curtain falls; the first act as distant as the last
citation: William Shakespeare quotes about death - Wikiquote

Name: Death2
Quote: Remember that all men must die.

Name: EmperorDemise
Quote: War is not a river, or a lake,\rbut an ocean of all that is evil.
citation: unlikely to find where this is translated from

Name: Enlightenment
Quote: Unless we love the truth, we cannot know it.
citation: Blaise Pascal/Of the Geometrical Spirit - Wikisource, the free online library
extra notes: the effects of reason accumulate without ceasing, whilst instinct remains always in the same state there is no man more different from another than from himself at different times

Name: Execution
Quote: \`It is a far far better thing I do than I have ever done;\rit is a far far better rest I go to than I have ever\rknown.\`

Name: Famine
Quote: Gnawing, gnashing, tearing, cracking: Great Kronos swallowed each as they escaped the womb

Name: Fate
Quote: Alea iacta est. An est?\rThe die is cast. Or is it?

Name: Feast2
Quote: \`A Black Boar's head was placed on the table and thoughts of matrimony turned to murder.\`

Name: Feast3
Quote: In the concert of Europe only the players change,\rthe instruments are forever death and cruelty.

Name: Feint
Quote attribution: Hagakure should check if translations are copyrighted
Quote: If one becomes like a vengeful ghost,\reven though his head is cut off, he should not die.

Name: Fog
Quote: \`You can't see which way is up in here!\`

Name: Fortress
Quote: Crash against our walls and recede like waves.

Name: Frost
Quote attribution: Jack London to build a fire
Quote: The proper function of man is to live, not to exist.
citation: No Time to Die eulogy quote and its importance explained (hitc.com)

Name: Grail
Quote: What is it? The phantom of a cup that comes and goes?

Name: Grenadier
Quote: \`The guard die, but do not surrender!\`

Name: Grenadier2

Quote: The difference between treason and patriotism is\ronly a matter of dates.

Name: Halberdier
Quote: \`Stick 'em with the pointy end!\`

Name: Jester
Quote: Madness is like gravity: All it takes is a little push.

Name: Juggernaut
Quote attribution: Phillip of Macedon to Spartan emissaries
Quote: \`If I enter Sparta, I will destroy you, never to rise again.\`\r\`If.\`

Name: Knight
Quote: Before I am lost, hell must open like a red rose,\rfor the dead to pass.

Name: Knight10
Quote: Swordsmanship untested in battle is like the art of\rswimming mastered on land.

Name: Knight11
Quote: What befalls others today,\rmay be your own fate tomorrow.

Name: Knight12
Quote: We bleed, we tremble; we forget, we smile\rThe mind turns fool, before the cheek is dry.

Name: Knight9
Quote: \`A day may come when the age of men comes\rcrashing down, but it is not this day!\rThis day we fight!\`

Name: Knight3
Quote: The folly of man is to pray for what he can obtain of\rhis own deeds.

Name: Knight4

Quote: Gawain took up the grim tool and lopped off his head, but the Green Knight picked it up again
citation: The Project Gutenberg eBook of Sir Gawayne and The Green Knight

Name: Knight5
Quote: Seed, Flower, Petal, Dirt.\rThe end is important in all things.

Name: Knight6

Quote: The freedom to choose,\rThis no man can take away;\rnot Caesar, not Commodus, not God himself.

Name: Knight7
Quote: \`Let me tell you what makes a knight: killing.\rEither enough men, or the right man.\rNot honor, not glory - killing.\`

Name: Landsknecht
Quote: \`Landsknecht LandSTRIKE!\`

Name: LionKing
Quote: \`You may earn salvation under my command,\rbut hardly riches.\`

Name: Militia

Name: Minister

Name: Musketeer
Quote: \`Pan Shot!\`

Name: Offering

Name: Officer

Name: Officer2
Quote: Men's ambition and innards strewn on the field,\rWe imagine ourselves a watchmaker and not a\rwatch.

Name: Officer3
Quote: When you are resolved from the beginning, you will\rnot falter, though you will still get the same soaking.

Name: Officer4
Quote: Your quality will be known among your enemies,\nbefore ever you meet them.

Name: Plague
Quote: the dogs dragged them out, and ate many bodies in the city. No bells tolled, and no one wept at any misfortune that befel, for almost every person expected death; and the thing went in such wise that folk thought that no one would remain on live, and many men believed and said: This is the end of the world

Quote: \`Remember me, when you come into your kingdom.\`

Quote: The blood of martyrs is the seed of the church.

Name: Riflemen

Name: Saboteur
Quote: \`Oh the Humanity!\`

Name: Sack

Name: Scout

Name: Shipwreck
Quote: \`Land! Sweet Land!\`

Name: Siege

Quote: All my life will be obscured by the doleful addition:\r'In his time Constantinople was taken and\rplundered.'

Quote: Their guns sounded from dusk till dawn;\rbut we repelled them all.

Name: Soldier2

citation: The Project Gutenberg eBook of War and Peace, by Leo Tolstoy

Name: Spy

Name: Storm

Name: Tower

Name: Void
Quote: He wished they would shoot him quickly and have it done with.
